Here is performance of `r params$ticker`.

```{r}
library(quantmod)
library(dygraphs)

stock_mkt <- getSymbols(Symbols = params$ticker, auto.assign = F)

stock_mkt <- tail(stock_mkt, n=30)

dygraphs::dygraph(OHLC(stock_mkt)) %>% 
  dygraphs::dyCandlestick() %>% 
  dyRangeSelector()
```
